caller_intent: Follow-up on a $400 refund promised after a car total loss claim, confirming payment status and resolution timeline.
resolution_steps: Agent Hazel confirmed the caller's identity and account details.
Checked the account to verify a $417.18 credit was applied.
Explained the refund is in process and typically takes 7-10 business days.
Provided National General's customer service number for direct follow-up.
Reassured caller to wait and contact the carrier if unresolved after 2-3 days.
summary: Tiodros Halesilasi followed up on a promised $400 refund after a totaled car claim. Hazel confirmed a $417.18 credit was applied and explained the 7-10 business day processing window. She provided National General's contact number for direct follow-up, with the caller agreeing to wait 2-3 days before contacting the carrier.
